message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. What would you say to an investment of $14,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit below its value. Could we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the product's value, but I am still looking to keep the cost under $12,000. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between at $11,500?
